issue.title: [Python] Dask Parquet integration test failure
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6551](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6551). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See upstream issue https://github.com/dask/dask/issues/5398

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6551?focusedCommentId=16929505) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Fixed with no action required on our part

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6551?focusedCommentId=16934196) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
This failed again in the last nightly run (also about parquet, but different test): https://circleci.com/gh/ursa-labs/crossbow/3027?utm_campaign=vcs-integration-link&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github-build-link

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6551?focusedCommentId=16934238) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
OK, I see there is already ARROW-6623 for that. Will comment there further
